data.meta_site_name: St Thomas More Church, Patcham, Brighton
data.text: Welcome to the parish of Saint Thomas More. We are a Catholic parish of the Diocese of Arundel and Brighton situated in Patcham. The church itself is situated at the junction of Braybon Avenue and Carden Avenue and is served by the 5B bus. Our Sunday Mass is celebrated at 10am. Please see the News Section for weekday Masses.
